LanguageData.MousekinRace_MessageIdeoPreceptRegen_Mus: Load a savegame first before regenerating precepts.
LanguageData.MousekinRace_MessageRitualOutcomeBlocked: Each heretic must have one escort.
LanguageData.MousekinRace_MessageRitualRoleMustBeHere: {0_labelShort} must be either a Mousekin prisoner with the Apostate or Devotionist trait, or a non-Mousekin rodentkind prisoner.
LanguageData.MousekinRace_MessageRitualRoleMustBeNonH: {0} must not have the Apostate or Devotionist traits.
